title: RSI + StochRSI Confluence
purpose: Fade extremes only when RSI extreme aligns with a StochRSI turn.
rationale: Fade extremes only when RSI extreme aligns with a StochRSI turn.

reading_guide.signal_logic: (rsi<30 AND stoch_rsi up) OR (rsi>70 AND stoch_rsi down)

beginner_summary: Use RSI extremes with a StochRSI cross to time reversals.
assistant_hints: Do not fade strong trends without additional context.
Take profits near mean (e.g., EMA or band midline).
